channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 11:32 Air alarm to Kharkiv Oblast Watch Further Messages.
item.description: 游댮 11:32 Air alarm to Kharkiv Oblast Watch Further Messages.#Kharkiv_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 10:52 Drawing of anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marhanetsky Territorial Community- Mirorsk Territorial Community- Pokrovsk Territorial Community- Chervonohrigor Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 10:52 Drawing of anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marhanetsky Territorial Community- Mirorsk Territorial Community- Pokrovsk Territorial Community- Chervonohrigor Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
